title: More Hextech keys pls
body: I wonder can rito do something like a guaranteed key drop like if u havent gotten a key past 9 wins the 10th is GARENteed.pls make it happen cuz i feel like everyone needs kesys to open their chests .For example i play around 10 to 15 games a day 5 to 9 are wins but i havent receved a key in 3 weeks now and im sitting at 8 unopened chests cuz i dont have the keys for them . i dont know if im just incredebly unlucy cuz my friend does get sometimes when we play and i dont but even he has 6 unopedned chests + he hasnt taken all the chests available , so pls make GARENteed key a thing so we can finaly open these chests (and get these champshards).

replies.body: I have 4 keys, I need chests at this point lol
I have four chests; I need keys.
At this point I'm trying to find someone who can consistently get an S rank so I can just play norms with them to get the chests lol....
Ya got to love that feeling when you think you did really good in a match and get A+{{item:3151}}
I had to sacrifice my dignity and play non support champs support to get the few chests I've gotten. I don't have a big enough champion pool {{item:3070}}
You're not supposed to get them THAT often, or else they'd really be just handing everything out for free.  The Keys are what they want you to buy afterall.
sitting here with about 8 chest... get a few keys in one day, then bam, i might get one key for the rest of the month.
I see everywhere posts with "more keys" meanwhile I'm waiting here with 7 keys and 0 chests :)))
